name: Homecoming: My Monster-Hunter Girlfriend
storyline:
The shy werewolf lady Ida of the Bloodhounds enjoys the quiet of her apartment and the cuddles of her outgoing human girlfriend Xen Lovebird.

The couple has never met each other's parents. Ida is forced to face her trauma when her girlfriend finally demands that they take the next step in their relationship and visit her werewolf parents
summary: A short linear visual novel about love, mental-health and werewolves. Developed for Spooktober VN Jam 2023.
